description:
This apartment has been restored to bring back its' original charm and all the gorgeous hardwood floors have been refinished.  Built in at the turn of the century it has old world character and modern-day conveniences. This apartment is one of a kind!
The apartment features (2) bedrooms (1) bathroom, a spacious living room and open floor plan.  The kitchen has been updated to include all new stainless-steel appliances:  refrigerator, dishwasher, electric stove and microwave.  It is approximately 1,000 square feet.
Amenities include a full-size Washer and Dryer on site in the basement.  The entire apartment has been freshly painted.  It also has a spacious patio adjacent to the living room, perfect for plants, outdoor furniture and relaxing!
This property is in West Mt Airy and easily accessible from multiple routes.  It is accessible to Chestnut Hill, Philadelphia, and the Carpenter Train Station, Regional Rail, Zone 2.
This location provides a quick commute to Chestnut Hill shops and restaurants and to Weaver's Way Co-Op.
The lease is for one year and it will continue a month-to-month basis. The apartment is $1,750 per month.
Landlord pays for sewer, water, trash and landscaping; resident is responsible for electric, gas and internet.
The apartment will be available February 15, 2023.

.  Leave a voice mail message and I will return your call; this is the preferred way to reach me.

The Breeze was once a historic school building built in 1893 which is now apart of the National Register of Historic Places. Being recently remodeled but keeping some of its historic charm, there are now plenty of spacious studio, one-, and two-, bedroom apartments. Some of the unique perks include original hardwood floors, repurposed school cabinets, and beautifully crafted doors and entryways. This building also offers the most amazing view of Center City from the rooftop deck, where you can relax and is perfect for entertaining.
Tenants are responsible for paying for electric.
Pets under 30lbs are allowed and there is a $250 non-refundable pet fee.

title: Renovated 1-Bedroom, at Independence Place on Washington Square
description: Renovated 1-Bedroom, 1-Bath at Independence Place on Washington Square. Freshly painted, Turn-key and Move-In ready! Hardwood floors welcome into Entry Foyer with large Coat Closet and open floor plan. NEW White Calcutta Quartz Kitchen countertops, NEW Stainless Steel Sink, NEW Stainless Steel GE Range, NEW Stainless Steel GE Microwave. White Kitchen with Soft-close Cabinetry, Contemporary Stainless Steel Cabinetry Pulls, Dishwasher, Fridge, Garbage Disposal and open Peninsula with floor to ceiling Built-Ins make the layout perfect for entertaining and for easy living. The spacious bedroom has a desk area and large Walk-In Closet, plus an additional spacious Wall Closet. The floor-to-ceiling glass windows provide Southern exposure. Simple yet sophisticated updated Full Bathroom has Grey/White Marble countertop and Stainless Steel Faucets. Washer and Dryer in unit and there is a separate Linen Closet as well. 24-hour Doorman, Concierge, On-site Maintenance and an elegant new Lobby and state-of-the art Fitness Center that is planned to open this year in 2023, make Independence Place a very well-run luxury Condominium residence located on Washington Square park with high-end restaurants, shopping, beauty salon and Philadelphia’s Historic landmarks, all within an easy walk. Parking is available underground in the Condominium’s garage for an additional cost.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Luxury Queen Village Rental
description: Welcome to your new luxury rental located on one of the best streets in Queen Village. This stunning 4-story custom-built home consists of 3 bedrooms, large den/bedroom/sunroom, and 2.5 bathrooms. Built in the 1960s, this home was designed to incorporate it's proximity to the river with its luxury ship-like features, including porthole windows, large open spaces, and stained glass windows.The first floor consists of a large garage with interior access, the utility closet, a half-bath off the entryway, the 4-Stop Elevator, and a den/ sunroom (which could be used as a fourth bedroom if needed) with access to the private patio and rear parking pad with remote control steel security gate. With over 3200 square feet livable space, this corner home is filled with natural sunlight, bay windows on three floors, and skylights in the primary sitting room and bathroom. But don't worry about too much light in the morning hours, the sunroom and the primary bedroom windows have powered and shuttered security gates to block any light and noise. On the second floor, you will find the Chef's Kitchen with Sub Zero refrigerator and Jenn-Air Electric Range, space for a breakfast nook, and a bay window with city views. The staircase opens up to the large open Dining Area featuring a double sided Marble-Clad Gas Fireplace that you can share with the sunken Living Room. Enjoy views of the Delaware River directly from your couch. On the third level, you'll find two great sized bedrooms, a full bathroom, the laundry room, a cedar closet, and your very own Cedar-Covered Sauna! If the stairs are too much, simply ride the elevator to the third floor which consists of your very own primary suite. A large east-facing bedroom with wall-to-wall sliding glass doors leading to a private deck will showcase the amazing view of the river. The hallway/sitting has more than enough storage with a whole hallway of closets for your wardrobe. The large primary bathroom features a double vanity, oversized shower, jacuzzi tub, and a water closet with bidet and small rear balcony with center city views. Your large rear patio is perfect for outdoor grilling and entertainment.
